Class LiImageGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.custom.ui.LiImageGetter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.Html.ImageGetter

    public class LiImageGetter
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.Html.ImageGetter
    This class is responsible for pulling the image bitmap from the server and setting it in the HTML content displayed on the Message row in LiConversationAdapter
